4.3.0.en: Added new devices:  ACC-250, ACC-3500, ACCT-510, ACM-2300-HC, ACST-606, ACST-9900. Fixed a issue where dimmer devices where not controlled correctly.

4.2.7.en: Toggle on/off when the dim level has changed.

4.2.5.en: Added signal improvements for dimmers. This should prevent the invalid data error for dimmer devices.
